### Response

```{r context="render"}
uiOutput("responseBox")

```

```{r context="server"}
output$responseBox <- renderUI({
  fileDf = input$responses
  req(fileDf)

  print(fileDf$datapath)

  htmlString = readr::read_file(fileDf$datapath[[1]])

  session$sendCustomMessage("add_marking_component", "message");
  shinyjs::extendShinyjs(text = ' shinyjs.addMarkingComponent =  function(params){
        let doc = new DOMParser().parseFromString(params.htmlString,"text/xml")
        doc.querySelectorAll("[id^="stu_ans_"]").forEach(function (node){
        let input = doc.createElement("input")
        input.id="mark_"+node.id
        node.appendChild(input);
        console.log(params.htmlString);
        alert("fds")
    })
  }', functions = c("addMarkingComponent"));
  #shinyjs::runjs("alert(params.alert)")
  shinyjs::js$addMarkingComponent(htmlString = htmlString)

  return(HTML(htmlString))

})
```
